replies.msg: 如題，諗緊部MacBook pro洗唔洗upgrade上i7
it depends on what is your program. generally, of you render videos or high quality voice, you well need more ram

quote.msg: it depends on what is your program. generally, of you render videos or high quality voice, you well need more ram

replies.msg: 入大學用，讀data science，就咁睇係咪冇咁大必要由i5上i7?

16GB RAM基本上夠
你要用到32就應該唔需要上黎問

quote.msg: it depends on what is your program. generally, of you render videos or high quality voice, you well need more ram
入大學用，讀data science，就咁睇係咪冇咁大必要由i5上i7?

replies.msg:
睇你computation intensive定係memory intensive
data science應該兩樣都要
雖然最後production都係放上cloud
但大學應該無咁多cloud比你玩

quote.msg: it depends on what is your program. generally, of you render videos or high quality voice, you well need more ram
入大學用，讀data science，就咁睇係咪冇咁大必要由i5上i7?

replies.msg:
Macbook做唔到TensorFlow加速，TensorFlow唔支援AMD GPU

但係pip install野就簡單直接方便過windows

我估你9成都係用Python，i5,i7,i9速度同效能上都差好多，因為無得用GPU加速

D Program主要都係食CPU多，所以有budget就上i9,無budget都咬咬牙上i7
Ram個方面最低限度都16GB, 如果8GB Ram真係好易爆跟住死kernel然後一直都Run唔到份code

我係過來人，用緊Macbook Pro 16” i9 16GB Ram
準備買多個eGPU嚟Run ML, 我範疇係OpenCV,無gpu下下要用gcp比好多錢同埋16GB Ram其實都唔係好夠，比我揀我次我會加到64GB Ram

希望以上嘅答案幫到你
一名Data Scientist上

一名Data Scientist上

replies.msg:
加多句，千祈唔好諗13吋，而且有得揀最好上i9, 32GB Ram up
當你用過i5嚟train野就知差幾遠有時要train成日，i5嘅話可能要兩倍時間而且粒u full load 100%兩三日真係會燒左粒U

見過有同學同事13吋pro同air燒左cpu, 最後都換左15吋同16吋pro
